Home.title: Secure Ballot
Home.description: A blockchain based voting system that ensures secure and transparent elections.
Home.how_description: Voting in the decentralized system is easy and secure. Follow the steps below to cast your vote.
Home.step1_description: Click on 'Start Voting' to access the voting portal.
Home.step2_description: Verify your identity by filling in your details and submitting your voter ID.
Home.step3_description: Select your preferred candidate and submit your vote.
Home.FAQ_description: Have questions about the voting process? Check out our FAQs below.
Home.faq1_title: How do I know my vote is secure?
Home.faq1_description: The blockchain technology ensures that your vote is secure and cannot be tampered with.
Home.faq2_title: How do I know my vote is anonymous?
Home.faq2_description: The blockchain technology ensures that your vote is anonymous and cannot be traced back to you.
Home.faq3_title: Can I change my vote after submitting?
Home.faq3_description: No, once you submit your vote, it is final and cannot be changed.
Home.faq4_title: How is my identity verified in the decentralized system?
Home.faq4_description: Your identity is verified using your voter ID and personal details.

About.title: About Secure Ballot
About.description: Welcome to our revolutionary decentralized voting system for general elections, powered by Hyperledger Besu based on Quorum. Through this private blockchain, voters can securely cast their votes from anywhere, ensuring accessibility and convenience. Each vote is cryptographically secured, immutable, and transparent, guaranteeing the integrity of the electoral process. With Besu's efficiency, scalability, and reliability, our system can handle large-scale elections with ease, accommodating millions of voters without compromising performance. Additionally, the decentralized nature of the blockchain ensures resistance to tampering and fraud, fostering trust in the electoral outcome. Beyond elections, our platform can be customized for various voting scenarios, such as corporate governance or community decision-making, offering a versatile solution for democratic processes. Join us in shaping the future of governance through secure, transparent, and decentralized voting.

Notices.title: Notices
Notices.notice1_title: Your Voice Matters: General Election Information
Notices.notice1_description: The general election is scheduled for 25th December 2029. Exercise your fundamental right to vote. Your voice matters. Choose from various voting methods, including in-person, early, or mail-in voting. Research candidates' platforms. Visit our election website for info. Polling places will adhere to strict health protocols. Stay informed through official channels and local media. Your vote shapes our democracy's future. Let's make it count! Thank you for your civic engagement.
Notices.notice2_description: Protect our democracy by reporting election irregularities. If you witness voter intimidation, suppression, or fraud, report it immediately. Call our election hotline or visit our website to submit a report. Your identity will remain confidential. Together, we can safeguard the integrity of our elections. Thank you for your vigilance and commitment to democracy.
